MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton, affecting properties in Overtoun House and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.30am. Our engineers have established that there is an overhead line fault and that repairs will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.21am on 28th January 2021.
